original_text: And he was buried in his tomb in the garden of Uzza, and Josiah his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 아몬이 웃사의 동산 자기 묘실에 장사되고 그의 아들 요시야가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And he was buried in his tomb in the garden of Uzza
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 웃사의 동산에 있는 자기의 무덤에 장사되었고

sentences.original_text: and Josiah his son reigned in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 요시야가 대신하여 왕이 되었으니
